page.title: 14Thorney Primary School
page.content:
The{Duke of Bedford School}is at the{Wisbech}end of the village. It was built in{1939}and opened in{1940.}In front of the school is the{A47}and it is very busy. We have a lollipop lady who crosses us over the road. The school has an{out door pool,two ponds, and a{skating pitch.}We have a big field which we play sports on, two {netball pitches,}and a{football pitch. There are{seven classes}in the school; three{infants}and four{junior classes. {Seven teachers}and{185 children}attend the school. We have quite a few{clubs at this school. They include{guitar, {stamp, young ornithologists}and {Dungeons and Dragons.}At night {Brownies, Guides, Cubs}and{Scouts}and {Badminton players}use the school hall. There are also{Art}and{keep fit clubs.
{
